short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block pop-ups and intrusive ads across Fandom with FADBlock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block ads across all fandoms on fandom.com, this extension blocks all intrusive videos and ads that you might ecnounter when browsing fandom and being able to pause the FADblock at any moment in the settings. Also FADblock allows the user to block cookies on any of the fandom fandoms.
